videos.title: Easy First Piano Lesson - For Kids!
videos.description:
🎹 Learn the basics of how to play the Piano in just a few minutes with this fun and easy lesson for kids! 🎶 This beginner-friendly tutorial covers the basics:  
✅ How the piano and keyboard are different and how they work
✅ How to find and recognize the piano keys  
✅ An easy way to always find the D key  
✅ A simple, fun pattern to play with your right hand  

Open the door to learning piano with this engaging and interactive piano lesson!  

🌟 **Try our piano program FREE for 7 days:**  
https://www.mymusicworkshop.com/signup  

🎵 **Discover more piano lessons like this one, PLUS tons of engaging music resources for kids at My Music Workshop:**  
https://www.mymusicworkshop.com/piano-lessons  

💥 **Why join My Music Workshop?**  
✔ Interactive video lessons with practice, worksheets and quizzes
✔ Musical activities that let kids create and produce music while they learn piano
✔ A virtual music store, music rooms, avatars, parents dashboard and more
✔ Perfect for beginners and young learners

Try it all totally free for 7 days! See the plan options at https://www.mymusicworkshop.com/signup/

👉 **Follow us!**  
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mymusicworkshop  

❤️ Like this video? Hit the **LIKE** button, and **SUBSCRIBE** to our channel for more kids piano (and other) music lessons.  

🎧 **Join thousands of kids learning music with us every day!** Let’s start making music! 🎶  

**Start now and get your first week FREE:**  
https://www.mymusicworkshop.com/signup

videos.title: Easy Jingle Bells Piano Tutorial - Beginner
videos.description:
🎶 Learn to play Jingle Bells 🔔 on the piano with this fun, easy tutorial for kids and beginners! Follow along as Mr. Elias from My Music Workshop breaks down each measure using colorful music notes and helpful piano key guides. 🎅 Impress your friends and family with this classic Christmas tune!

🌟 This simple, step-by-step lesson is perfect for beginners learning to play with their right hand. Want more? We teach advanced versions of Jingle Bells using two hands and different rhythms on our website, along with sheet music, interactive quizzes, and more!

🎹 Get more piano lessons and music fun for kids:
https://www.mymusicworkshop.com/

💥 Try our online piano program FREE for 7 days!

My Music Workshop founder Elias Berlinger will go over some simple strategies and tips that will help your family create a practice routine that you can stick to. 

Visit https://www.mymusicworkshop.com/ to try out our full music learning program for kids.

Save time and headaches by doing a few simple things for your kids as they learn to play their instrument.

videos.title: How to Set Up a Kid's Drum Set | Parent’s Beginner Guide
videos.description:
Oh No! Your Child Wants to Learn to Play the Drums? Here’s Why It’s Actually Great!🎶
If your child has been asking for drum lessons or showing an interest in playing the drums...don’t worry! In this video, we explain why the drums are a fantastic instrument for kids and how drumming helps with their overall development. From improving focus and coordination to fostering creativity, there are so many benefits to drumming for children. We'll also teach you how to set up a drum kit!

► Ready for Drum Lessons? Start Your FREE Trial Here: https://www.mymusicworkshop.com/ 

In this video, you’ll learn:

-Why the drums are perfect for beginners and kids who want to dive into music .
-The amazing benefits of drumming for your child’s coordination, focus, and musical understanding
-Essential tips on choosing the right drum set for beginners 
-A step-by-step guide on how to set up a drum kit at home 

BONUS: Watch as Mr. Elias, our expert drummer, walks you through everything from assembling a beginner drum set to offering drumming tips for parents to help guide your child’s musical journey. Whether you’re just looking for drum lessons for kids or wondering how to set up a beginner drum set, we’ve got you covered!

Suggested Product Links:

Ear Protection: https://amzn.to/3ZMfI7y

Acoustic Drum Sets: 
Ludwig Questlove Kit: https://sweetwater.sjv.io/B0mDK1
Pearl Roadshow Jr.: https://sweetwater.sjv.io/0ZEkYM
Pearl Roadshow (full kit with cymbals): https://sweetwater.sjv.io/baRg2k
Silencer Pads (drum and cymbal mutes): https://sweetwater.sjv.io/6e3BkV 

Electronic Drum Kits: 
Alesis Nitro Max (just the drum set): https://sweetwater.sjv.io/k0yGmL
Alesis Nitro Max Bundle: https://sweetwater.sjv.io/jrNAkn
Roland TD-07 (more expensive but a GREAT drum set): https://sweetwater.sjv.io/LXeYmY
 
Let us know in the comments if your child is interested in learning the drums, and tell us what else you'd like to see! Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and hit the notification bell so you never miss a beat with My Music Workshop!

Also, if you would like to check out some our beginner drum lessons on YouTube, here are the links:

Your First Drum Lesson: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h7W3yyBuAxU&list=PLLR080Bq5OSHAt9qMaVT1ixqUww_EzMff&index=2 

Your First Drum Set Lesson:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YXrq5lOw5KA&list=PLLR080Bq5OSHAt9qMaVT1ixqUww_EzMff&index=3

We are an affiliate for Amazon and Sweetwater. If you click one of the links above and purchase a product from one of those retailers we receive a small commission. Thanks for supporting our small business!!
